name: Smart Ball
description: Smart Ball is an action-adventure game developed by Game Freak and System Sacom and released by Epic/Sony Records and Sony Imagesoft for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1991. It is known as Jerry Boy (ジェリーボーイ) in Japan. A sequel titled Jerry Boy 2 (ジェリーボーイ2) was in production, but was never released.
